mapper.select: SELECT X.RNUM, X.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM,T.* FROM (SELECT * FROM POST WHERE BOARD_CODE=#{board_code} ORDER BY P_CREATION_DATE ASC) T ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endnum}) X WHERE X.RNUM >= #{startnum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{board_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( POST_CODE, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, P_CREATION_DATE, VIEW_NUM, RECOMMEND_NUM, MEMBER_ID, BOARD_CODE ) VALUES( #{post_code}, #{post_title}, #{post_content}, #{p_creation_date}, #{view_num}, #{recommend_num}, #{member_id}, #{board_code} )
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET VIEW_NUM=VIEW_NUM+1 WHERE POST_CODE=#{post_code}
UPDATE POST SET RECOMMEND_NUM = RECOMMEND_NUM+1 WHERE POST_CODE = #{post_code}
